amendment.description: To prevent changes to the State and local tax (SALT) deduction that mainly benefit the wealthy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3251 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 326.

action.text: Amendment SA 3251 proposed by Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S6215-6216; text: CR S6215) To prevent changes to the State and local tax (SALT) deduction that mainly benefit the wealthy.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3251 proposed by Senator Grassley.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3251 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 326.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3251 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 326.
